entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New Carlisle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:06 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: New Carlisle 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -9.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -17.0°C
Wind: WNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
